projects.title: GLOBAL BRAND ESHOP
projects.description: A comprehensive e-commerce solution comprises a dynamic admin panel for streamlined store management and an interactive client-side interface that empowers consumers to explore, compare, and place orders. Essential components include user authentication, secure payment processing, an intuitive product catalog, efficient order placement, and inventory management. Additionally, robust search and filtering capabilities enhance user experience, while responsive design ensures accessibility across various devices. This holistic approach to e-commerce ensures a user-friendly platform that both customers and administrators can rely on.

projects.title: RECRUITING WOMEN & MOMS
projects.description: Recruiting Women & Moms is a job-matching platform that connects recruiters with women and moms looking for employment opportunities. The platform is built using Angular and has three key roles: recruiter, candidate (job seeker), and admin. Recruiters can post job listings and search for potential candidates based on their skills and experience. Candidates can create a profile, search for job listings, and apply for positions that match their qualifications. The admin role oversees the platform's overall operations and manages user accounts. The goal of this platform is to provide a more targeted and streamlined job search process for women and moms, while also helping recruiters find qualified candidates for their job openings.
